assumptions: Initial production release is complete and stable
Monitoring and analytics are available for feedback loops
Product roadmap inputs are captured from ops stakeholders
risks: Schema changes may require careful migration sequencing
Performance regressions may occur with expanded usage

phases.name: Evolution & Optimization
phases.objective: Iterate based on real usage, improve reliability, and expand capabilities.

sprints.focus: Feedback loops, reliability, and operational hardening

tasks.title: Set up post-launch metrics dashboard
tasks.acceptance: Key KPIs visible for reservations, cleaning, tasks

tasks.title: Implement user feedback intake and triage workflow
tasks.deliverable: Feedback intake process and backlog labels
tasks.acceptance: New issues are categorized and routed

tasks.title: Triage and fix top 10 production bugs
tasks.acceptance: Top 10 issues closed with regression tests

tasks.title: Audit RLS policies against real usage
tasks.deliverable: RLS audit report and policy adjustments
tasks.acceptance: No denied-access incidents in audit logs

tasks.title: Optimize most expensive queries from logs
tasks.acceptance: Top 5 slow queries improved

tasks.title: Stabilize realtime update race conditions
tasks.acceptance: No duplicate or stale states in QA scenarios

tasks.title: Enhance offline queue and retry behavior
tasks.acceptance: Failed ops retry and reconcile cleanly

tasks.title: Add operational SLA alerts for sync failures
tasks.acceptance: Alerts trigger within 15 minutes of failure

tasks.title: Improve audit log query performance
tasks.acceptance: Audit log page loads under target latency

tasks.title: Add rate-limit backoff for Hospitable API
tasks.deliverable: Backoff and jitter in API client
tasks.acceptance: No burst failures at rate limit thresholds

tasks.title: Refine cleaning board UX based on staff feedback
tasks.acceptance: Staff confirms improved flow

tasks.title: Refine tasks filters and bulk actions
tasks.acceptance: Bulk actions cover common workflows

tasks.title: Add inventory reorder recommendations
tasks.acceptance: Recommendations appear for low-stock items

tasks.title: Add inventory reorder UI and actions
tasks.acceptance: Users can acknowledge or mark ordered

tasks.title: Add advanced reservation filters
tasks.acceptance: Filters include platform, guest count, revenue

tasks.title: Implement reservation revenue breakdown
tasks.acceptance: Breakdown matches financial fields

tasks.title: Add reservation revenue UI widget
tasks.acceptance: Widget displays per-reservation revenue

tasks.title: Add bulk task assignment
tasks.acceptance: Multiple tasks can be assigned in one request

tasks.title: Add bulk task assignment UI
tasks.acceptance: Users can assign tasks to a staff member

tasks.title: Add owner portal read-only views
tasks.acceptance: Owners see only owned properties and reports

tasks.title: Enhance notifications routing (LINE/email)
tasks.acceptance: Notifications respect user preferences

tasks.title: Add notifications preferences UI
tasks.acceptance: Users can configure channels

tasks.title: Harden backup/restore procedures
tasks.acceptance: Restore drills succeed in staging

tasks.title: Run post-launch regression suite
tasks.acceptance: No high severity regressions remain
